fields.name: ProvisioningState
fields.description: The current provisioning state of trusted access role binding.

fields.name: Roles
fields.description: A list of roles to bind, each item is a resource type qualified role name. For example: 'Microsoft.MachineLearningServices/workspaces/reader'.

fields.name: SourceResourceId
fields.description: The ARM resource ID of source resource that trusted access is configured for.
